name: stammeringly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
: If you say something stammeringly, you say it with unusual pauses or repeated sounds, either because of speech problems or because of fear and anxiety: "Will you marry me?" he asked stammeringly. See
stammer
More examplesFewer examples"I'd so much hoped... " he stammeringly repeated, looking up with pleading eyes.With these few words, he stammeringly attempts to convey his feelings.Mark read the lines haltingly, stammeringly.He was so taken with her that he stammeringly asked her to come with him.
